evidence.claim: Deerfield Agency highlights their ability to integrate various technologies for health-tech solutions.
The agency has experience with strategies that involve HIPAA compliance in their marketing practices.
Deerfield offers services aimed at digital transformation in healthcare, signaling an understanding of EHR and FHIR requirements.
They emphasize collaboration with hospitals and clinics, adding clarity to their understanding of healthcare operational frameworks.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found for X12 transactions or healthcare API automation.
